data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Moyo to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Moyo, Uganda
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Moyo, Uganda.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Moyo to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Moyo, Uganda.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Hindi people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, you gave the church of Moyo, Uganda the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 15,746 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Moyo.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 15,746 believers in the state of Moyo the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

location.name: Moyo
location.people_groups_list: Arab, Lebanese, Kalenjin, Pokot, Nyang'i, Kaliko, Meneng
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Arab, Lebanese (15,000), Kalenjin, Pokot (134,000), Nyang'i (18,000), Kaliko (13,000), Meneng (7,800)
